name: backend-testing---afex
description: Pruebas backend realizado a los endpoints de afex plus

scripts.test:ci:
cypress run --config video=false --env configFile=cypress.json --reporter mocha-junit-reporter --reporter-options junitFile=cypress/results/junit-[hash].xml,jsonFile=cypress/results/output-[hash].json && cat cypress/results/output-*.json | jq -r '.stats.tests' | xargs echo -n 'Total tests: '; cat cypress/results/output-*.json | jq -r '.stats.tests' | paste -sd+ - | bc && cat cypress/results/output-*.json | jq -r '.stats.failures' | xargs echo -n ', Failures: '; cat cypress/results/output-*.json | jq -r '.stats.failures' | paste -sd+ - | bc && cat cypress/results/output-*.json | jq -r '.stats.passes' | xargs echo -n ', Passed: '; cat cypress/results/output-*.json | jq -r '.stats.passes' | paste -sd+ - | bc && echo -e '
' && npx cypress-slack-reporter --reporter-options configFile=cypress.json --config message=failedOnly --config channel=$SLACK_CHANNEL_ID --config botName=$SLACK_BOT_NAME --token $SLACK_BOT_TOKEN

author: Jairo Bermudez
